name: Arcana
description: Proficiencies related to the Beyond and the manipulation of its energies.
You have learned the proper ways to purify and prepare materials for use in occult research or ritual.

//: This is the basic gatway Arcana proficiency--nearly everything at all mystical takes it
description: You have an understanding of how the hidden forces of the world interact and possible ways to manipulate them yourself.
You have an understanding of what the Great Work entails and just how difficult it is to achieve.
You have learned the necessary ways and methods to write down occult formulae so they can be learned and mastered.
